text: "Patriots of Micronesia" is the national anthem of the Federated States of Micronesia. Before it was adopted, "Preamble" was used. ==Lyrics== I 'Tis here we are pledging, With heart and with hand, ğ„† Full measure of devotion To thee, our native land. ğ„‡ II Now all join the chorus, Let union abide. ğ„† Across all Micronesia Join hands on every side. ğ„‡ III We all work together, With heart, voice and hand, ğ„† Till we have made these islands Another promised land. ğ„‡ (Full measure of devotion To thee, our native land. Across all Micronesia Join hands on every side. Till we have made these islands Another promised land.) ==References== ===Notes=== Category:Federated States of Micronesia Category:Oceanian anthems
title: Patriots of Micronesia
